Today, Dan tells Jordan about the wild, earth-shattering changes that took place in the world of Alex Jones between Monday, Feb 21st and Tuesday, Feb 22nd.  Topics include:

*Can Alex do character based improv comedy?
*Does Alex actually know what "strawman" means?
*How much money did Alex lose overnight?
*Did that New York Times article turn out well?
